UniprotID	Q99705
Accession	Q99705;B2RBX6;Q5R3J1;Q96S47;Q9BV08
EntryName	MCHR1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Melanin-concentrating hormone receptor 1 (MCH receptor 1) (MCH-R1) (MCHR-1) (G-protein coupled receptor 24) (MCH-1R) (MCH1R) (MCHR) (SLC-1) (Somatostatin receptor-like protein)
GeneName	MCHR1 GPR24 SLC1
Length	353
Function	Receptor for melanin-concentrating hormone, coupled to both G proteins that inhibit adenylyl cyclase and G proteins that activate phosphoinositide hydrolysis.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
